tasks.label: OpenClaw: config (isolated debug gateway)
tasks.command: OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.mode local && OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.bind loopback && OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.port 18790 --json && OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.enabled true --json && OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.basePath '"/openclaw"' --json && OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug" corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.root '"${workspaceFolder:openclaw}/dist/control-ui"' --json
